description: This roasted cauliflower dish is a restaurant quality entree for vegetarians and meat eaters alike.
name: Roasted Cauliflower with Capers & Raisins Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 200Â°C. Toss the cauliflower into a roasting tin with a tablespoon of olive oil. Roast for 40 minutes, turning the florets over halfway through cooking.
Heat the rest of the oil with the garlic cloves in a saucepan on low heat for 3-4 minutes, remove from the heat and leave to infuse for 5 minutes.
Place the raisins in a small bowl and cover with boiling water. Leave to plump up for 5 minutes. Remove the garlic from the oil and tip the capers, parsley, almonds and raisins in, mixing well.
Arrange the roasted cauliflower on plates, pour over the caper sauce and serve with a wedge of lemon.
